entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:12 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog Patches, 4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 3:42 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Fog Patches
Temperature: 4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 4.5°C
Wind: ESE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers after midnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
